import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useHistory, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../FormContainer' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../../actions/cartActions' import { getUserDetails } from '../../actions/userAction' const ShippingScreen = () => { //Router Hooks const { push } = useHistory() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({ address, city, postalCode, country })) push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Adress setAddress(e.target.value)} > Postcode setPostCode(e.target.value)} > City setCity(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
